backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the gym tracker backend, defining data types (exercises, workouts, user profiles, recovery states) and an exercise library with workout generation and recovery tracking logic.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, key features, and notable implementation details.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Deployment retry log documenting multiple build/deploy attempts with descriptions of backend Motoko filter syntax fixes, recovery mode corrections, and workout generation improvements across versions.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the Gym Tracker PWA, configuring viewport, PWA meta tags, Apple touch icons, iOS splash screens, and loading the React app via Vite.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Gym Tracker defining app name, display mode, theme colors, icon assets, and categories for installable web app support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, page navigation between all app screens, workout generation with validation, and bottom navigation rendering.
Modal dialog component for logging and updating the user's bodyweight and weight unit, with input validation and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Workout, Progress, History, Settings) and opens a SettingsModal when the Settings tab is tapped, with haptic vibration feedback on each tap.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Dialog modal that fetches and displays alternative exercises for the same muscle group, allowing the user to swap the current exercise and recording the change via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header displaying the FitTrack logo/title with Settings and Logout icon buttons; logout clears the Internet Identity session and React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Wraps children with touch-event-based pull-to-refresh logic, showing an animated spinner indicator and triggering an async onRefresh callback when the pull threshold is reached.
Displays a card with per-muscle-group recovery percentages and status badges fetched via useGetRecoveryState, with optional weighted leg subgroup averaging and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Dialog modal for editing user profile settings (gender, bodyweight, weight unit, training frequency, dark mode, rest timers), persisting changes to the backend and syncing the app theme.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full-screen animated splash screen showing the app logo, name 'Gym Tracker', and tagline with staggered fade/slide-in animations on a black background.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Sticky top status bar that displays the current workout streak (with a flame icon) and today's formatted date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: A modal dialog component that generates a QR code and shareable link for a workout, supporting clipboard copy and native Web Share API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient with support for delegation identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and mutations for interacting with the backend, including user profile, workouts, and exercises, with error classification and validation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: A React hook that manages the Screen Wake Lock API to prevent screen dimming, with automatic re-acquisition on visibility change and comprehensive error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file enforcing a dark-only Telegram-inspired theme with Tailwind, CSS custom properties for design tokens, iOS safe area utilities, and mobile typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/profileCache.ts: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, clear, and check active workout sessions in sessionStorage, with a 24-hour expiry on stored state.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utility functions to detect, convert, validate, and format backend BigInt timestamps (nanoseconds or milliseconds) into human-readable date strings.
Builds ordered workout sections from a flat exercise list, enforcing a fixed muscle-group order (Chest→Back→Shoulders→Arms→Legs→Core) with Legs split into subsections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying workout stats, recovery heatmap, streak, and navigation to new workouts, history, and progress, with pull-to-refresh and bodyweight modal support.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: History page showing a calendar of trained dates and a list of past workouts with formatted timestamps and volume, supporting pull-to-refresh.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page presenting the FitTrack branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Page that lets users select a workout type (Full Body, Upper Body, Lower Body) and triggers AI workout generation via mutation hooks, then passes the result to the parent via callback.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Initial setup form that collects user profile data (gender, bodyweight, weight unit, training frequency, rest times) and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays muscle group recovery status and weekly training volume using data from recovery and volume query hooks, with pull-to-refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Shows a generated workout plan before starting, validates for duplicates and data integrity, and allows exercise swapping via a modal or full workout regeneration.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Active workout session page managing per-exercise set logging, rest timers, wake lock, PR detection with confetti, session persistence, and weight suggestion updates.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-only TypeScript interfaces for core domain objects including Exercise, WorkoutExercise, RecoveryState, MuscleGroupVolume, and SetConfiguration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (using CSS variables), border radii, shadows, font sizes, and animation keyframes, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting active bugs (broken workout generation, invalid Motoko filter syntax using `.toLower()` instead of `Text.toLowercase()`), architectural notes, known issues, and pending fix/feature requests for the Motoko backend.
